item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: IMan
item.content:encoded:
[horizontal_tab_group] [horizontal_tab title='+30 Shortcodes']

+30 Shortcodes

[row][span8]

You can easily change theme general color to any color you like using admin control panel. In addition to that, almost all page element shortcodes can have their own color customization

[/span8][/row]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='+600 Google Font']

+600 Google Font

[row][span8]

Easily change your website fonts using admin control panel, you can choose from more than 620 google fonts and have different fonts for headings, navigation and content text.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='+400 Icons Font']

+400 Icons Font

[row][span8]

Use +450 beautiful icon fonts in your website. Icon fonts are sharp graphics which will look great on high resolution devices and retina displays.

[/span8][/row]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Demo Content']

Import Demo Content

[row][span8]

You can simply import our demo content to your website by one click. Either you want to see how does page layouts work or you want to build your website on top of our demo pages, this feature is there for you.

[/span8][/row]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Custom Widgets']

Custom Widgets

[row][span8]

BIg Junior comes with 7 custom widgets, including Flickr Widget, Twitter Widget, Video Widget, Progress Widget and etc.

[/span8][/row]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Sliders Templates']

Pre-Made Useful Sliders Templates

[row][span8]

You can use our pre-made useful slides to build your own awesome slides. 12 beautiful sliders to use on different pages, for different purposes.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Mega Responsive']

Mega Responsive Design

[row][span8]

Big Junior is super responsive, either you are using it on large screen monitors, tablets, smart phones or you want to put your shortcodes in parent sections with different widths, it works perfectly.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Retina Ready']

Retina Ready Design

[row][span8]

Added sharp retina graphics for best display on hight resolution devices and Retina screens. Retina ready it is!

[/span8][/row]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Translation Ready']

Translation Ready

[row][span8]

Big Junior is ready to be translated to your desired language. In addition to that this theme works perfectly with WPML WordPress plugin.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Unlimited Colors']

Unlimited Colors

[row][span8]

You can easily change theme general color to any color you like using admin control panel. In addition to that, almost all page element shortcodes can have their own color customization.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='SEO Optimized']

SEO Optimized

[row][span8]

Big Junior is coded with best SEO practices, so your contents will index correctly in search engines and you will get a lot of visitors by search engine results.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Layer Slider']

Layer Slider

[row][span8]

Big Junior comes with a license for Layer Slider WordPress plugin by Kreatura. AN amazing slider with responsive functionality, SEO optimization and WYSIWYG editor to drag and drop your content into slides. $15 value included.

[/span8][/row]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Great Support']

Great Support

[row][span8]

Our support forum at support.pixflow.net will welcome you having any question in mind. We usually come back to you in less than 24 hours. Our support staff would be happy to help you solve any issue and take care of small customization for free.

[/span8][/row] [/horizontal_tab]   [/horizontal_tab_group]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: mohsen
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.content:encoded:

most creative ways you can imagine

GEORGE HANSON

Graphic Designer & Web Developer

image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/IMG_9856.jpg' description='Powerful and logical back end code means a lot to many users we have'] [team_icon icon='facebook-3'/][team_icon icon='github-2'/][team_icon icon='tumblr-2'/][team_icon icon='dribbble-3'/] [/team_member] [separator margin='small'/] [/span3]   [span3] [team_member name='Marco Vellasco' title='Graphic Designs' url='http://www.envato.com/about' image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/LS-Xmas_Action-fox.jpg' description='Design everything that we have in mind to be ready for being developed'] [team_icon icon='facebook-3'/][team_icon icon='github-2'/][team_icon icon='tumblr-2'/][team_icon icon='dribbble-3'/] [/team_member] [separator margin='small'/] [/span3] [/row] [row][span3]

General Salon

[separator size='small' margin='small'/] Big Junior is a multi-purpose retina ready wordpress theme with incredible functionality. You can literally build each page with our awesome shortcode generator, customize it and change each element's position to make the best layout out of our design. This ability is vital for a freelancer to deliver the right product or service. A freelancer cant deliver what wasnt asked for[/iconbox]   [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Client'] [iconbox title='Good Client' icon_position='top' icon='accessibility']The number one characteristic of a good client is that they are able to express what they want and need. This ability is vital for a freelancer to deliver the right product or service. A freelancer cant deliver what wasnt asked for[/iconbox] [/horizontal_tab] [horizontal_tab title='Partners']  

Good Parthner

To begin your quest to find the right partner, think about the traits and behaviors you prefer. Most people automatically think of superficial traits such as height or eye color. Though these traits may be important to you, other traits may also be more important when it comes to having a healthy, long-term relationship. Here is a list of some important qualities to consider: [/horizontal_tab] [/horizontal_tab_group]

    [row] [span4] [iconbox title='Rules for Marketing ' icon='stats']If you think of marketing as the same thing it was twenty (or even ten) years ago, you're basically screwed. The reason is simple. What works today is the opposite of what worked in the past.[/iconbox] [/span4] [span4] [iconbox title='Great Company Name' icon='spell-check']Most smart entrepreneurs go with the straightforward option and name the business something relevant to their industry or goal. Charity:water is a great example for our explanation .[/iconbox] [/span4]   [span4] [iconbox title='Be international' icon='earth']Branding involves what people think about your business and your products. "Think of a brand as a reputation," says Paul Williams, founder of the international firm Idea Sandbox[/iconbox] [/span4] [/row] [title_separator title='My Clients'/] [carousel items_visible='4'] [carousel_item image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/logo2.png'/] [carousel_item image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/logo-5.png'/] [carousel_item image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/logo5.png'/] [carousel_item image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/quete_09.png'/] [carousel_item image='http://demo.sacredpixel.com/wp/bigjunior/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/logo3.png'/] [/carousel] [/container]

item.title: Let me know if its good
item.dc:creator: Rezo
item.content:encoded: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. item.content:encoded: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing

item.title: Quote Post Types Of Blog
item.dc:creator: IMan
item.content:encoded: I feel the greatest destroyer of peace today is 'Abortion', because it is a war against the child... A direct killing of the innocent child, 'Murder' by the mother herself... And if we can accept that a mother can kill even her own child, how can we tell other people not to kill one another? How do we persuade a woman not to have an abortion? As always, we must persuade her with love... And we remind ourselves that love means to be willing to give until it hurts...

item.title: Mother Teresa
item.dc:creator: IMan
item.content:encoded: Live simply so others may simply live

item.title: Mother Teresa
item.dc:creator: IMan
item.content:encoded: In the silence of the heart God speaks. If you face God in prayer and silence, God will speak to you. Then you will know that you are nothing. It is only when you realize your nothingness, your emptiness, that God can fill you with Himself. Souls of prayer are souls of great silence.

item.title: MY KITCHEN & GREEN PIECE BG
item.dc:creator: Joe
item.content:encoded:
What is it that makes a face look beautiful? What are the differences between very attractive and less appealing faces? For every historical period and every human culture, people have always had their own ideal of beauty. But this ideal has never been constant and is still subject to changes.
<!--more-->
In our research project we adopted an empirical approach and created prototypes for unattractive and attractive faces for each sex by using the morphing technique prototype for an unattractive face ("unsexy face") was created by blending together four faces that had previously been rated as very unattractive. The "sexy face" was created by blending together four of the most attractive faces, respectively (see report). In order to find out the characteristic differences between attractive and unattractive faces, we presented pairs of one "sexy" and one "unsexy" image for both sexes to test subjects. The task was to report which facial features were perceived to be different between the two faces

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Such a beautiful blog, very good job guys ;)

item.title: GREAT DAY BROWNI DOG!
item.dc:creator: Joe
item.content:encoded:
Physical exercise is good for mind, body, and spirit. Furthermore, team sports are good for learning accountability, dedication, and leadership; among many other traits. Putting it all together by playing a sport is a winning combination.
<!--more-->
Playing a sport requires a lot of time and energy. Some may think this would distract student-athletes from school work. However, the opposite is true. Sports require memorization, repetition, and learning, skill-sets that are directly relevant to class work. Also, the determination and goal-setting skills sports require can be transferred to the class -room.

item.title: It Sound Like Wisdom
item.dc:creator: IMan
item.content:encoded: " The so-called right to abortion has pitted mothers against their children and women against men. It has sown violence and discord at the heart of the most intimate human relationships. It has aggravated the derogation of the father's role in an increasingly fatherless society. It has portrayed the greatest of gifts--a child--as a competitor, an intrusion and an inconvenience. It has nominally accorded mothers unfettered dominion over the dependent lives of their physically dependent sons and daughters. And, in granting this unconscionable power, it has exposed many women to unjust and selfish demands from their husbands or other sexual partners "

item.dc:creator: Joe
item.content:encoded: [section_alt background_color=''] [/section_alt]
